description:
Wage slave Murata comes to the ballpark to relax, until a new beer vendor girl catches his eye...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Beer Uriko no Ruriko-san / Jouren-san, Irasshai / Ame to Namida
Ruriko the Beer Vendor Girl / Welcome, Regular / Candy and Tears
ビール売り子のルリコさん / 常連さん, いらっしゃい♡ / アメと涙
